body_html:
the DataLoader gives no ability to split a dataset further. You will have to do that yourself.
You can use a SubsetRandomSampler to achieve it, or a custom sampler of your choosing.

In the future, discussions such as these are more suited for https://discuss.pytorch.org/

In the future, discussions such as these are more suited for https://discuss.pytorch.org/
body:
the DataLoader gives no ability to split a dataset further. You will have to do that yourself. 
You can use a `SubsetRandomSampler` to achieve it, or a custom sampler of your choosing.

In the future, discussions such as these are more suited for https://discuss.pytorch.org/
